product_name: Maui Jim Makawao Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Complete with maximum optical clarity and PolarizedPlus(R)2 lens technology, the refined, classic Maui Jim Makawao Polarized Sunglasses are an ideal choice for any lifestyle, any occasion. PolarizedPlus2 lenses eliminate 99.9% of glare; patented multi-layer design and lens treatment maximize color transmission and enhance visible color. Waterproof and anti-oil coating sheds water and repels grease and smudges. Light Tortoise frames feature HCL (High Contrast Lens) Bronze lenses for added contrast on overcast or foggy days; subtle bronze tint is ideal for variable sunlight. Matt Black Rubber frames feature Neutral Grey lenses for especially bright, direct sunlight; they offer rich color and contrast along with very high light production. Olive Stripe frames feature Maui HT (High Transmission) lenses that balance contrast and depth of field for crisper details during varying conditions. With a center thickness of 1.8mm, SuperThin glass lenses are 20% thinner and lighter than standard laminated glass lenses for long-wearing comfort. Anti-corrosive spring hinges; embedded rubber nose pads. The Maui Jim Makawao Polarized Sunglasses complement round, oval and heart/triangular shaped faces; they best fit medium sized faces. Glasses come with a case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: Complete with maximum optical clarity and PolarizedPlus(R)2 lens technology, the refined, classic Maui Jim Makawao Polarized Sunglasses are an ideal choice for any lifestyle, any occasion.
